entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
